comments.body: Might be helpful to have a doc here. Specifically I think it's useful to note that the new image is the result of applying the passed delta to the previous image.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@   *                                  delta to the previous image.
   */
  def publish(newHighestMetadataOffset: Long,
              delta: MetadataDelta,
              newImage: MetadataImage): Unit
